item.title: rick roderick - 101 Socrates and the Life of Inquiry
item.description: #internetContent #philosophy/rickRoderick Article link: [[rick roderick - 102 Epicureans, Stoics, Skeptics (1990)]] 101 Socrates and the Life of Inquiry A course in philosophy and human values may seem paradoxical because philosophy was that discipline, in our traditions – that’s western traditions, western civilisation – that began with a search for unconditioned knowledge.
